description: Why projects are not completed? Why deadlines are not met? How to stop the issues in the communication and delivery process. We live in the connected world. Everything is combined together. IT doesn't exist by itself. IT is a part of the business process, but sometimes it is very difficult to understand the second side needs. Deliver your projects without the pain of misunderstanding. Quick guide how to open your mind and eyes to needs of the second side and how to discover what is really needed.

title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - Łukasz Karwacki - Business vs IT. How to avoid delays in deadlines
